mapper.select: SELECT BI_PAGE_ID, PAGE_TYPE, PAGE_TITLE, PAGE_NAME, PAGE_URL, MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, con.SUBNAME AS pageTypeStr FROM bi_page JOIN config con ON PAGE_TYPE = con.SUBID WHERE con.CONFIGID = ${biPage.pageTypeStr} ORDER BY BI_PAGE_ID desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bi_page ( PAGE_TYPE, PAGE_TITLE, PAGE_NAME, PAGE_URL, MENU_ID, MENU_NAME ) VALUES ( #{biPage.page_Type}, #{biPage.page_Title}, #{biPage.page_Name}, #{biPage.page_Url}, #{biPage.menu_Id}, #{biPage.menu_Name} );
mapper.update:
UPDATE bi_page
PAGE_NAME = #{biPage.page_Name},
PAGE_TYPE = #{biPage.page_Type},
PAGE_TITLE = #{biPage.page_Title},
PAGE_URL = #{biPage.page_Url},
MENU_ID = #{biPage.menu_Id},
MENU_NAME = #{biPage.menu_Name},
WHERE BI_PAGE_ID = #{biPage.bi_Page_Id}
